PopUp.title: SALOM!
PopUp.text: Biz bilan xarid qilish endi yanada oson! Siz £, $ yoki € da to'lashingiz va £50 dan yuqori balla buyurtmalar uchun Buyuk Britaniya bo'ylab bepul kuzatiladigan yetkazib berish hamda £100 dan yuqori barcha buyurtmalar uchun bepul xalqaro kuzatiladigan yetkazib berishdan foydalanishingiz mumkin.
PopUp.subtext: Yangi kelganlar, uslub yangilanishlari va mavsumiy chegirmalardan eksklyuziv foydalanish uchun xabarnomamizga obuna bo'ling.

BuildYourOwn.title: SEVIMLI ZANJIR VA TUMORLARINGIZNI TANLASH ORQALI O'ZINGIZNING NOYOB BO'YINBOG'INGIZNI YARATING!
BuildYourOwn.step1: O'zingizga yoqadigan uzunlikdagi va rangdagi (kumush va tilla) zanjirni tanlashdan boshlang va uni savatga qo'shing.
BuildYourOwn.step2: Keyin, o'zingizga yoqqan tumorlarni ko'rib chiqing va tanlang. Har bir tumorni ham savatga qo'shing.
BuildYourOwn.step3: Agar siz eslatma qoldirmoqchi bo'lsangiz (masalan, maxsus ko'rsatmalar), buni xaridni rasmiylashtirishda "Sotuvchiga eslatma" bo'limida amalga oshirishingiz mumkin.
BuildYourOwn.tip: Bizning maslahatimiz: To'liq va muvozanatli ko'rinish uchun biz 5 dan 11 tagacha tumor tanlashni tavsiya qilamiz. Biz ularni eng yaxshi natija uchun o'lchami va shakliga qarab chiroyli joylashtiramiz. Bo'yinbog'ingizni loyihalashda zavqlaning!

Footer.brandDescription: Mijozlariga o'z-o'zini sevish va o'ziga ishonchni mustahkamlaydigan, kundalik hayotlariga mos keladigan mahsulotlarni taqdim etishga intiluvchi yuqori sifatli zargarlik brendi.
Footer.newsletterSub: Yangi kelganlar va chegirmalardan eksklyuziv foydalanish uchun obuna bo'ling.

Cart.title: Savat
Cart.freeShippingPromo: Bepul yetkazib berish uchun yana {amount} qo'shing!

Auth.regSuccess: Ro'yxatdan o'tish muvaffaqiyatli yakunlandi! Tizimga kiring.

HomePage.createDescription: Design a necklace that tells your story. Choose your chain, select your charms, and we'll craft something extraordinary just for you.
HomePage.step1: Select your chain in your preferred length and color
HomePage.step2: Browse and add your favorite charms
HomePage.step3: We'll arrange them beautifully for you
HomePage.brandText1: A high-quality jewellery brand that strives to provide pieces fostering self-love and confidence while fitting seamlessly into daily life.
HomePage.brandText2: All pieces are crafted with 18K Gold Plated Stainless Steel — water resistant and tarnish free.
